review_title: Demanding, fast-paced, healthcare industry with a wealth of innovative technology and ongoing quality.
pros: Team Oriented, Quality, Fast-Paced, Demanding Environment
cons: High Turn Over Rate, Hospital was shutdown, but now reopened under a very respected owner.

pros: This hospital offers a work environment that allows a brand new or graduate nurse to get their bearings.  It’s a community hospital that allows you to build a good relationship with patients.  In addition, the doctors there are willing to teach if you are willing to learn.
cons: Cons to the hospital is NO COFFEE SHOP!

pros: Close to home and I like the people I work with
cons: Census often goes low and my unit gets closed down and management has been laying staff offfor low census.

review_title: Overall the facility is nice to work at.
job_title: Customer Service Representative in Fairmont, WV
pros: In the department I worked in everyone is like family. They are all there for you when you need help.
cons: Department heads need to be micro managed better. Therefore the employees of the department have someone better to rely on for help.

pros: Affordable health insurance, services a community in need, close-knit family ties among staff, access to senior leadership.
cons: Below market-value compensation, limited PTO, underwhelming tuition reimbursement plan, low employee morale, ill-equipped mid level management, limited growth opportunities, financial instability, disreputable and unscrupulous corporate executives, substandard internal communication, oppressive Human Resources, high turn-over rates, dysfunctional organization

review_title: For the most part, a great place
pros: Small town community hospital. People are great. Close knit
cons: Going thru a lot of changes, not enough staff

pros: Most staff from physicians to house keeping to kitchen are friendly and courteous with patients best interest at heart
cons: Upper management from directors to managers to vp to Cfo to ceo.

pros: Close to home, avoids a drive to Bridgeport or Morgantown nothing else favorable, nothing. Nasty on very unfriendly leadership.
cons: Doing it the same way with the same people for 40 years leaves them in a medical knowledge black hole.

pros: Its a great job with motivated people
cons: No cons because I am a positive person

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Pleasant Valley, Marion, WV
pros: There are no pros of this facility
cons: It is now shut down.
